title: Kayn and master yi audio glitch
body: Not sure if its only the skin or not but when kayn Es with a master on the enemy team you can hear yis ult sounds. It also continues into rhaast form for the rest of the game.

replies.body: This should now be fixed as of 8.7 :) Let me know if it isn't!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zimberfly,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=yo9lv7sc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-05T23:29:25.674+0000)
>
> This should now be fixed as of 8.7 :) Let me know if it isn't!
